mapper.select: SELECT * FROM funding WHERE reg_stts = 'e1' ORDER BY 1

SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT rownum rn , a.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM funding LEFT JOIN ( SELECT board_no, TRUNC(fnd_end_date - sysdate) as dday, priceSum, payCount, TRUNC((priceSum/goal_price)*100,2) as goalPer FROM funding LEFT JOIN (SELECT board_no, sum(price*qty) as priceSum, sum(qty) as payCount FROM payment_detail GROUP BY board_no ) USING(board_no) ) USING (board_no)
AND reg_stts = 'e1'
AND FND_STR_DATE < sysdate+2
AND crp_ctg = #{category}
AND title LIKE '%${search}%'
order by 1 desc
order by payCount asc
order by dday asc
) a
WHERE rownum <= #{page} * 9) b WHERE b.rn > (#{page}-1) * 9

SELECT count(*) FROM funding
AND reg_stts = 'e1'
AND crp_ctg = #{category}
AND title LIKE '%${search}%'
AND fnd_end_date >= TRUNC(sysdate)

SELECT * FROM member JOIN (SELECT * FROM funding JOIN (SELECT board_no, TRUNC(fnd_end_date - sysdate) as dday, NVL(priceSum,0) as priceSum, NVL(payCount,0) as payCount, NVL(TRUNC((priceSum/goal_price)*100,2),0) as goalPer FROM funding LEFT JOIN (SELECT board_no, sum(price*qty) as priceSum, count(board_no) as payCount FROM payment_detail GROUP BY board_no) USING(board_no) WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}) USING (board_no)) USING (mem_no)

SELECT * FROM (SELECT board_no, sum(qty) as sumCount, title, fnd_price, rep, reg_stts FROM funding JOIN payment_detail USING (board_no) GROUP BY board_no,title, fnd_price,rep,reg_stts ORDER BY sumCount DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4 AND reg_stts = 'e1'

SELECT board_no, pay_no, pay_deta_no, pay_code, mem_no,title FROM payment JOIN (SELECT board_no, pay_no, pay_deta_no, title FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN (sumPrice > goal_price) THEN 'y' ELSE 'n' END AS success, board_no, pay_no, pay_deta_no, title FROM funding JOIN (SELECT SUM(price) sumPrice, board_no, pay_no, pay_deta_no FROM payment_detail WHERE board_ctg = 'n9' GROUP BY board_no, pay_no, pay_deta_no) USING (board_no) WHERE fnd_end_date+1 = TRUNC(sysdate)) WHERE success = 'n') USING (pay_no)
